name: bbPress Capabilities
author: johnjamesjacoby

sections.description: A handy tool for viewing, editing, or resetting a specific user’s forum capabilities.
sections.installation:
1. Place the ‘bbp-capabilities’ folder in your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Visit your ‘Plugins’ page, and activate bbPress Advanced Capabilities.
  3. Edit a user with a role in your forums.
  4. Scroll to the bottom and you will see a new table, where you can edit or reset a user’s forum capabilities.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Place the ‘bbp-capabilities’ folder in your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Visit your ‘Plugins’ page, and activate bbPress Advanced Capabilities.
  3. Edit a user with a role in your forums.
  4. Scroll to the bottom and you will see a new table, where you can edit or reset a user’s forum capabilities.

short_description: Advanced user capability editing, specifically for bbPress
description: A handy tool for viewing, editing, or resetting a specific user’s forum capabilities.
